title: AdvancedNetworkDiagnostics
description: Performs comprehensive network diagnostics including connectivity tests, speed tests, open port scans, and detailed network configuration analysis.
author: Satyasn01

commands.title: Fetches and displays basic IP configuration.
Tests connectivity with common public servers like Google and GitHub.
Displays active network connections and checks for open ports.
Executes a PowerShell script for network speed testing.
Scans for open ports on the local system.
Performs a trace route to Google to check for network path issues.

title: Chrome
description: This extension automatically opens Chrome browser when you run Chrome.
author: bashamega

title: Touch
author: bashamega
description: This extension allows you to use touch on Windows.

title: battery
author: bashamega
description: Check your laptop's battery status with ease using this user-friendly batch script. Get real-time updates on the current charge level and charging status, ensuring efficient power management for uninterrupted productivity.

title: IP Information
author: Axorax
description: Get information about your computer's IP address

title: filecounter
description: Counts all the files in a specific directory that you can assign

Count all the files in a specific directory

title: open

title: Sleep
description: The script configures the display timeout duration for both AC power (plugged in) and DC power (on battery) using the entered value.

title: DriveInfo
description: Displays detailed information about all storage drives connected to the system, including the type, filesystem, free space, and total size.
author: anjali vaish
